body.p: Kindergarten News The Kindergarten children have, been having a good time with a farm they have built in the and table They also have a garden planted and have lettuce, radishes and carrot growing. Glee Wasbotten is back with us again after an absence of five weeks. WÂ« are glad to have her back. Some of the rest of our people are back after short absences because of ill- We have been working on a Dutch scene this week,
